articles.title: Asia stocks lag Nikkei's ascent, China skips rate cut - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares got off to a stumbling start on Monday as China's central bank wrong footed markets by skipping on a rate cut, even as data due this w…
articles.content: SYDNEY, Jan 15 (Reuters) - Asian shares got off to a stumbling start on Monday as China's central bank wrong footed markets by skipping on a rate cut, even as data due this week is expected to show t… [+3896 chars]
